page.title: 02THE EDINBURGH ZOO.
page.content: { Edinburgh Zoo}is a{BIG}attraction for the little ones.Owned by the Royal Zoological Society of Scotland it covers 80 acres of the southern slopes of{Corstorphine Hill.}The zoo was established by Thomas Gillespie and opened its gates in 1913.{Corstorphine {Hill House(1793)}forms the centre point in the zoo. The aim is to keep the animals home as natural and realistic as possible. Attractions include Animal Feeding- Sea Lions,Penguins,Grey Seals and Big Cats.You can make Brass Rubbings of rare animals.We all enjoy the{Penguin {Parade. } Many people now take part in the {Animal Adoption Scheme. The Zoo-Education was set up in 1973 for schools.Our class loves visits to learn about Mammals or Apes & Monkeys etc.
